examples.input: How much does premium membership cost?
What are your customer support hours?
examples.expectedOutput: Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM Eastern

examples.input: How can I get free shipping?
What is the fastest shipping option?
Can I return a product after 60 days?
examples.expectedOutput: No, returns must be within 30 days

examples.input: What benefits do premium members get?
examples.expectedOutput: Free shipping, 20% discount, early access, priority support
